title: [GAMEPLAY] Renekton W stun and damage is not activating!
body:
Immediately after I use an ability, so q, or e, using w sends the skill on cooldown and does not allow me to stun, and does not allow me to do the damage that w is supposed to have. It doesn't seem to be a once-in-awhile thing. It happens pretty consistently. Please let me know what you guys are doing to fix this, if you are even aware of it at all? Thanks!
-28 Kills

replies.body: I've been seeing the same problem but this occurs if i use my W on someone and they use a gap closer to move away (riven E, ezreal's E, Ekko's E and even flash) they take no damage the stun doesn't go off and they ability goes on full cooldown.

This should have been fixed with this patch today. 
I couldn't reproduce this on the live server right now. 
Are you still experiencing this?
